headline: How Softer Q2 2026 Results Will Impact Brown-Forman (BF.B) Investors
summary: Brown-Forman Corporation has reported past second-quarter 2026 earnings to October 31, 2025, with sales of US$1,036 million and net income of US$224 million, both lower than the same period a year earlier. The earnings softness, including earnings per share from continuing operations of US$0.47 versus US$0.55 a year ago, highlights ongoing pressure in key spirits categories even as new products like Jack Daniel's Blackberry gain traction. With revenue and earnings both lower than last year,...
